## ERROR TIPS

### Distance Placement Errors (continued)
- Repeated failures placing burner inserters due to distance (12.5 > max 10)
- Always move within placement range (10 tiles) before attempting to place entities

### Entity Placement Conflicts (continued)
- Failed to place small electric pole at (17.5, 67.0) due to blocked terrain
- Failed to place burner inserters at multiple positions due to existing objects
- Verify space is available before placement attempts using get_entities_at()
- Remove existing blocking entities before placement attempts

### Power System Issues (continued)
- Secondary power plant boiler has no fuel
- Steam engine not connected to power network
- Mining drills showing "no power" status despite connections
- Verify fuel supply to all boilers
- Check power pole connections throughout facility

### Production Chain Problems (new)
- All furnaces showing "no ingredients" status despite configured drills
- Drills showing "waiting for space in destination" warnings
- Verify direct drill-to-furnace connections are properly configured
- Check output directions and drop positions of mining drills

### Inventory Management (continued)
- Failed to insert coal into furnace due to full inventory
- Monitor inventory levels before attempting insert operations
- Implement proper error handling for inventory operations

### Fluid System Issues (new)
- Failed to connect boiler to steam engine in secondary power plant
- Verify pipe connections between fluid entities
- Check fluid box connections and directions
